definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
(once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
to exclaim in admiration/a gasp of surprise
(idiom) to gasp in amazement/to acclaim as the peak of perfection
sighing voice, wailing breath (idiom)/to heave deep sighs/to sigh in despair

sentences.english: The breath goes now, and some say no;
sentences.chinese: 叹其气绝魂离，亦有说不然。

sentences.english: The old woman sighed out her grief.
sentences.chinese: 老妇人叹着气叙说她的悲哀。

sentences.english: And prison sentences have become longer, he lamented.
sentences.chinese: 监狱刑期也变长了，他叹道。

sentences.english: Akasha is one of the many souls claimed by the blade, Frostmourne.
sentences.chinese: 阿卡莎是死于叹霜之剑下的无数亡魂之一。

sentences.english: Thousands of events in the past pours into my mind. By toasting the void, I lament the bygone heroes.
sentences.chinese: 数千年往事注到心头，把酒凌虚，叹滚滚英雄谁在？

sentences.english: He sighed, and concluded, "Even with love."
sentences.chinese: 他叹了口气，总结道，“甚至是爱。”

sentences.english: I sighed and edged into bed next to him.
sentences.chinese: 我叹了口气，贴着他挤上了床。

sentences.english: Li sighed - this was the last message she wanted to receive.
sentences.chinese: 李红艳叹了口气，这是她最不想收到的微信。

sentences.english: With a sigh she walked back to her other students who were clustered at the back table patiently waiting her return.
sentences.chinese: 她叹了口气，回到后排那一群正耐心等著她的学生。

sentences.english: Martin heaved a great sigh of envy.
sentences.chinese: 马丁长长地叹了一口气，心里很羡慕。

sentences.english: Darky heaved a sigh for him.
He sighs, and wipes stray bread crumbs from his beard, rising to his cloven feet.
sentences.chinese: 他叹了口气，抹掉沾在胡子上的面包屑，翘起二郎腿。

sentences.english: She sighs and stands up, weakly.
sentences.chinese: 她叹了口气站了起来，很虚弱。

sentences.english: Why is it necessary to sigh-off gentleman.
sentences.chinese: 人生能有几回搏，君子何须叹离合。

sentences.english: With a sigh he bowed and picked ip up with his spent hand.
sentences.chinese: 叹了一口气，他弯下腰来用筋疲力尽的手拣起了它。

definition: to recall with emotion/to feel sentiments
sorrow/grief/pity/to grieve for/to pity/to lament/to condole
Ai (c. 2000 BC), sixth of legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God, also known as Li 釐|厘[Li2]
to sigh in regret or pity/Taiwan pr. [wan4]
